summary: Ninjas steal a research tape. Colonel chuck connors sends two agents undercover to retrieve it. Ninjas are sent to scare them off. The two seek help and are trained by a ninja master to become Ninjas themselves.
cast: Chuck Connors|Mike Kelly|George Nicholas|Cara Casey|Manji Otsuki|John Ladalski|Brian Wong|Thomas Lung|Jack Long|Toby Russell|George Tan
director: Directors: Yu Wang (as Richard Ward), Dusty Nelson
title: Los asesinos de Sakura
